verses.verse: In the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto Z'rubavel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, governor <S%H6346><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and to Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus speaketh <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This people <S%H5971><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, The time <S%H6256><s%> is not come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, the time <S%H6256><s%> that the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> should be built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8736><s%>.
Then came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Is it time <S%H6256><s%> for you, O ye, to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in your cieled <S%H5603><s%> <S%H8803><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and this house <S%H1004><s%> lie waste <S%H2720><s%> ?
Now therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; Consider <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> <S%H3824><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>.

Ye have sown <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8804><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8687><s%> in little <S%H4592><s%>; ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, but ye have not enough <S%H7654><s%>; ye drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, but ye are not filled with drink <S%H7937><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; ye clothe <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you, but there is none warm <S%H2527><s%>; and he that earneth wages <S%H7936><s%> <S%H8693><s%> earneth wages <S%H7936><s%> <S%H8693><s%> to put it into a bag <S%H6872><s%> with holes <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; Consider <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> <S%H3824><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%>.

Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>; and I will take pleasure <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in it, and I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Ye looked <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and, lo, it came to little <S%H4592><s%>; and when ye brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it home <S%H1004><s%>, I did blow <S%H5301><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon it. Why? saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>. Because <S%H3282><s%> of mine house <S%H1004><s%> that is waste <S%H2720><s%>, and ye run <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8801><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his own house <S%H1004><s%>.

Therefore the heaven <S%H8064><s%> over you is stayed <S%H3607><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from dew <S%H2919><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> is stayed <S%H3607><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from her fruit <S%H2981><s%>.

And I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for a drought <S%H2721><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, and upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and upon the corn <S%H1715><s%>, and upon the new wine <S%H8492><s%>, and upon the oil <S%H3323><s%>, and upon that which the ground <S%H127><s%> bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and upon men <S%H120><s%>, and upon cattle <S%H929><s%>, and upon all the labour <S%H3018><s%> of the hands <S%H3709><s%>.

Then Z'rubavel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, with all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and the words <S%H1697><s%> of Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him, and the people <S%H5971><s%> did fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Then spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> messenger <S%H4397><s%> in the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> message <S%H4400><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I am with you, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Z'rubavel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, governor <S%H6346><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of all the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>,

In the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.
